extension.summary: Run an FTP Server from Kodi
extension.description: Starts a minimally configurable FTP Server to provide external read/write file access to your Kodi file system from an external source. This is useful for situations where data access can be particularly challenging. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK
extension.disclaimer: There is little-to-no security measures baked into this add-on beyond the FTP server supporting SFTP and standard ports. It's highly recommended not to expose this over a public network. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
